name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta. Combine all with spaghetti.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: Prepare mascarpone mixture. Soak ladyfingers in espresso. Layer with mascarpone. Dust with cocoa.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook with tomato sauce, garlic, and ginger.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken with butter, tomato puree, cream, and spices.

name: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Roll sushi rice with nori, fish, and vegetables.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake in a preheated oven.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Toss tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and cheese with olive oil.
